description: Civilians in parts of north and south Gaza have been told to evacuate as Israel's renewed bombardment continues.
maintext: "A night of horror," Samira, a mother of four, told the Reuters news agency. "It was one of the worst nights we spent in Khan Younis in the past six weeks since we arrived here... We are so afraid they will enter Khan Younis."
title: Israel-Gaza war: Residents of Khan Younis say Israeli strikes heaviest since start of war
